name: CreateWorkloadProtectionPolicy
description:
Create a new Workload Protection policy for cloud workloads.

This tool allows you to create a new Workload Protection policy using specified parameters. It is used to enhance security for cloud workloads by defining protection policies. Note: This endpoint is not available for the Government (US1-FED) site.

parameters.name: policy_name
parameters.description: The name of the workload protection policy to be created.

parameters.name: resource_type
parameters.description: Specifies the type of the resource. Must always be set to 'policy'.

value_schema.description: The type of the resource, must always be `policy`

parameters.name: policy_description
parameters.description: Provide a description for the new workload protection policy.

parameters.name: host_tags_for_policy_deployment
parameters.description: List of host tags to define where the policy is deployed. Each tag must be a string.

value_schema.description: The host tags defining where this policy is deployed

parameters.name: host_tags_configuration
parameters.description: Host tags for policy deployment: inner values linked with AND, outer with OR.

value_schema.description: The host tags defining where this policy is deployed, the inner values are linked with AND, the outer values are linked with OR

parameters.name: policy_enabled
parameters.description: Set to true to enable the workload protection policy.
